protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol
The normalized data was obtained by using RMA. All chips were normalized together using robust multichip average.  Median polish was used for the probe level summary.

text: Total RNA was isolated using Qiagen RNeasy Mini Kit according to the kit protocol.

protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana wild-type Col-0, transgenic 35S::AtFAAH line (OE11a-1) and homozygous knockout line (Atfaah -/-) were planted on MS media and seedlings were grown for 14 days in 14h/10 h light/dark cycle prior to RNA isolation for arrays.
